mapper.select: SELECT P.PRO_NO, V.V_NO, P.PRO_NAME, P.PRO_PRICE, P.PRO_QUANTITY, P.PRO_BANNERIMG, P.PRO_WISH, P.PRO_SELLCOUNT, P.PRO_HIT, P.PRO_BIZNAME, M.M_EMAIL, M.M_NO, V.V_BIZNAME, V.V_LICENSE, M.M_NAME, M.M_ADDRESS1, M.M_ADDRESS2, M.M_ZIPCODE, M.M_EMAIL, M.M_PHONE FROM PRODUCT P INNER JOIN VENDOR V ON P.V_NO = V.V_NO INNER JOIN MEMBERS M ON V.M_NO = M.M_NO WHERE P.PRO_NO = #{PRO_NO}
select count(*) from ( SELECT P.PRO_NO, B.B_WRITER, B_DATE, B_CONTENT, B_EVAL FROM PRODUCT P INNER JOIN BOARD B ON P.PRO_NO = B.PRO_NO WHERE P.PRO_NO = #{PRO_NO})
